name: Pumpkin Soup
description:
## Pumpkin Soup

A creamy soup that Goblins love! Owning this item unlocks fields and new seeds.

You can craft this at the Kitchen in the game.

## Supply

Unlimited

### Crafting Costs

---

SFL
5 Pumpkins
